SI DICEN CON TODOS LOS MEDIOS DE PAGO, ES PORQUE SI DEJA CON LA DE MERCADO PAGO MARTHA

Not a slight at Shopee Pay of course, as Mercado Pago has been around for much longer and started before critical mass was achieved.

To $SE's credit, it is focusing much more on off-Shopee loans now and is seeing solid traction.

But as of now, there is no comparison.

$MELI Mercado Pagoâ€™s TPV was $71.2B in the latest quarter, over 4x its marketplace GMV.

$SE Moneeâ€™s TPV is not disclosed but as of the latest quarter, off-Shopee SPayLater still accounts for <10% of its total loan book.

That said, it grew >300% YoY and >40% QoQ and Malaysia for instance is over the 10% mark.

I would hazard a guess that we are maybe 3-5 years away from parity in off-platform v on-platform TPV.

It is crucial that $SE takes a sizeable chunk of payments in SEA and is a key part of my bull case. So far, things are going well.

I must also note that $SE GMV is 2x the size of $MELI, so they are not as far off as they look on an absolute basis.
